title: Topic 002 Question 014
body: You receive a security alert in Microsoft Defender for Cloud as shown in the exhibit. (Click the Exhibit tab.)
After remediating the threat, which policy definition should you assign to prevent the threat from reoccurring?
options: Storage account public access should be disallowed
Azure Key Vault Managed HSM should have purge protection enabled
Storage accounts should prevent shared key access
Storage account keys should not be expired
